meanings.definition: An outstanding example of a particular type or class.
meanings.sent1: The cake she baked was a real lulu at the bake sale.
meanings.sent2: The new car he bought was a lulu, turning heads wherever he drove.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot at the zoo was a lulu, entertaining all the visitors.
meanings.sent4: Her singing voice was a lulu, filling the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display on the Fourth of July was a lulu, lighting up the sky.

meanings.definition: A remarkable or wonderful person or thing.
meanings.sent1: The little puppy was a lulu, bringing smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent2: The sunset over the ocean was a lulu, painting the sky in beautiful colors.
meanings.sent3: The magic show at the birthday party was a lulu, leaving everyone amazed.
meanings.sent4: His invention was a lulu, changing the way people lived their lives.
meanings.sent5: The surprise party for her was a lulu, making her feel truly special.
